publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2595 Derek Brownlee: 10th Anniversary of Wigtown Book Festival—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the Wigtown Book Festival on its 10th anniversary; notes the impressive line-up of over 150 authors from different fields of literature; welcomes the boost that the festival brings to the local economy and community; believes that the scenic setting adds a great deal to the festival; further notes the important role that the festival plays in the Scottish literary calendar, and looks forward to the festival having a long and bright future ahead of it.

S3M-2595 10th Anniversary of Wigtown Book Festival (lodged on 24 September 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Jackson Carlaw*, Hugh Henry*, Murdo Fraser*, Margaret Mitchell*, Stuart McMillan*, Alasdair Morgan*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Elaine Smith*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Des McNulty*, Bashir Ahmad*, John Lamont*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Mary Scanlon*, Christine Grahame*, Elizabeth Smith*, John Scott*, Jamie McGrigor*, Alex Johnstone*, Bill Aitken*, Aileen Campbell*, Nanette Milne*, Patrick Harvie*

S3M-2595 Derek Brownlee: 10th Anniversary of Wigtown Book Festival—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the Wigtown Book Festival on its 10th anniversary; notes the impressive line-up of over 150 authors from different fields of literature; welcomes the boost that the festival brings to the local economy and community; believes that the scenic setting adds a great deal to the festival; further notes the important role that the festival plays in the Scottish literary calendar, and looks forward to the festival having a long and bright future ahead of it. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jackson Carlaw, Hugh Henry, Murdo Fraser, Margaret Mitchell, Stuart McMillan, Alasdair Morgan, Mr Frank McAveety, Elaine Smith, Roseanna Cunningham, Des McNulty, Bashir Ahmad, John Lamont, Bill Kidd, Sandra White, Mary Scanlon, Christine Grahame, Elizabeth Smith, John Scott, Jamie McGrigor, Alex Johnstone, Bill Aitken, Aileen Campbell, Nanette Milne, Patrick Harvie, Bob Doris*, Robin Harper*, Angela Constance*
S3M-2595 10th Anniversary of Wigtown Book Festival (lodged on 24 September 2008) Ted Brocklebank*
S3M-2595 10th Anniversary of Wigtown Book Festival (lodged on 24 September 2008) Jack McConnell*, Gil Paterson*, Cathy Jamieson*
S3M-2595 10th Anniversary of Wigtown Book Festival (lodged on 24 September 2008) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-2595 10th Anniversary of Wigtown Book Festival (lodged on 24 September 2008) Peter Peacock*
